  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_453</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_453</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Proyecciones</string>
            <string language="en">Projections</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projektionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projections</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proiezioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προβολές</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones ejemplos de proyecciones de un punto, un segmento y una porción de un plano, en el espacio, sobre tres planos coordenados.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to illustrate the projections of a point, a segment and a portion of a plane in three-dimensional space onto the three coordinate planes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">proyección</string>
            <string language="en">projection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">punto</string>
            <string language="en">point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">coordenadas</string>
            <string language="en">coordinates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">segmento</string>
            <string language="en">segment</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Projektionen eines Punktes, des Segments und des 
Teils einer Fläche im dreidimensionalen Platz auf die drei 
beigeordneten Flächen zu veranschaulichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'illustrer les projections d'un point, d'un segment et 
d'une partie d'un avion dans l'espace tridimensionnel sur les trois 
avions du même rang.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações ilustrar 
as projeções de um ponto, de um segmento e de uma parcela de um 
plano no espaço tridimensional nos três planos coordenados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
illustrare le proiezioni di un punto, di un segmento e di una parte di
un aereo nello spazio tridimensionale sui tre aerei coordinati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να επεξηγήσει τις προβολές ενός σημείου, ενός τμήματος 
μνήμης και μιας μερίδας ενός αεροπλάνου στο τρισδιάστατο 
διάστημα επάνω στα τρία ισότιμα αεροπλάνα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projektion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
